title: StorySIS Semantics
description: Schema for StorySIS.semantics (common/text/visual/audio) based on docs/SIS_ja.md.

common.description: Story-level shared meaning layer (themes, intent, nuance) referenced by scenes and media.

themes.description: Core themes of the story. Keep them as short tags for reuse/search.

descriptions.description: Notes that explain the intent/subtext not captured by the short summary (multiple allowed).

examples: A gentle story about emotional growth rather than fast-paced action.
The world feels safe, but characters still face internal conflict.
Focus on small everyday moments that gradually change relationships.

descriptions: A gentle story about a girl learning to trust the forest and herself.
Focuses on emotional growth rather than fast-paced action.
The central tension is unresolved grief, not external danger.
Moments of warmth appear briefly, making the ending feel earned.

text.description: Story-level text style policy (optional). Scenes/media may override.

tone.description: Overall tone for the story text.

visual.description: Story-level visual style policy (optional). Scenes/media may override.

style.description: Default visual style for the story.

audio.description: Story-level audio/music direction (optional). Scenes/media may override.

genre.description: Default genre or sound palette for the story.
